name: Samurai vs. Ninja
description:
Samurai vs. Ninja is multiplayer fighting game best played with 4 players. Game is Smash-like fighter with pinch of Mario Run's item collecting aspect.

Player who collects first 5 Onigiris wins the game. Watch out your rivals thought! If you die, you will drop Onigiri and it will be pickable once again.

You'll need xbox controller to play game. Exact controls visible in-game.

Enjoy your fight!
